price: Baka ikaw ay kikitil ng sarili mo na hindi sila maging mga mananampalataya.
arabic: لَعَلَّكَ بَٰخِعٞ نَّفۡسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُواْ مُؤۡمِنِينَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: laʿallaka bākhiʿun nafsaka allā yakūnū mu'minīna
